original_text: I will command the soldiers on all the mountains of my land to attack Gog. That is what I, the Almighty Lord, say. Gog's soldiers will fight against each other with their swords.
korean_text: 주 여호와의 말씀이니라 내가 내 모든 산 중에서 그를 칠 칼을 부르리니 각 사람이 칼로 그 형제를 칠 것이며

sentences.original_text: on all the mountains of my land
That is what I, the Almighty Lord, say
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 나 전능한 주가 말하는 것이다

sentences.original_text: Gog's soldiers will fight against each other
